PhD program in various disciplines is offered. Admission to the PhD programs are in two stages; firstly candidate is required to clear Ph.D. Admissions Test (PAT), candidates who have cleared PAT are called for an interview where they have to present their research proposals. CVV accepts CUET scores for admissions to all UG programmes. The institution which is located at Angadippuram in Perinthalmanna Taluk, Malappuram District and is spread across 8.73 hectares, was established under Directorate of Technical Education, Govt of Kerala and is approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic College - [GPC], Palakkad, Palakkad
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College (GPC), Palakkad, Kerala was established on 1980. It is a state-run college which has become a premier institution of engineering and technology in Kerala over the years. It offers diploma courses in several Engineering branches. Admission to this premier college is based on the merit only. Big companies like Tech Mahindra, Ashok Leyland, TVS, and BEML Ltd. etc visit the campus every year for recruiting the students. The institution holds industrial collaborations and MOUs to sharpen the technical skills of the students studying here.

College_Name: SCMS College Of Polytechnics - [SCMSCP], Ernakulam
College_Summary: SCMS College of Polytechnics (SCMSCP), Ernakulam, Kerala, was founded in the year 1976. It offers diploma courses in various Engineering and Technical branches. Admissions to this college are strictly based on merit only. Candidates have to fill the application form online. With around 25 faculty members in the institution, the college imparts quality education in all the diploma specialized courses to meet the industrial needs in the trend. Placements are not that much great but it offers some value-added courses to upskill the students in all possible ways.

College_Name: MOSC Institute of Allied Health Sciences - [MOSCIAHS] Kolenchery, Ernakulam
College_Summary: MOSC Institute of Allied Health Sciences (MOSCIAHS) was formally consecrated as a hospital on 14th September 1970 with 100 beds and it has been growing steadily over the years into a multi-specialty; 1100 mbedded Super specialty tertiary care Medical College Hospital. The MOSC Medical College Hospital is located at Kolenchery, very near to Kochi-Madurai road NH 85, with wide campus sprawled across the scenic nlandscape. On the educational front, the hospital has access to all the clinical, pre-clinical, para-clinical, and super specialty departments.

College_Name: Grace International Academy- [GIA], Kollam
College_Summary: Grace International Academy (GIA) is an undergraduate college affiliated to the University of Kerala, which started functioning in May 2019. It is located in Punalur, in Kollam district, and is a border town between Kerala and Tamil Nadu, situated a stone throw away from Punalur railway station and 70 km away from Thiruvananthapuram airport.

College_Summary: Ashtamgam Ayurveda Chikitsalayam & Vidyapeetham (AACV) is an institute of a class of its own established under the aegis of Ashtanga Educational Trust (AET) in the year 2011 which is dedicated for the cause of reviving the legacy of a great tradition of Ayurveda. It started its functioning as an OP consultation unit with a small treatment facility in the year 2013 and at present, it has one of the best Ayurvedic teaching hospitals in the state of Kerala, Ashtamgam Ayurveda Chikitsalayam, which is attached to a residential ayurvedic school, Ashtamgam Ayurveda Vidyapeetham.

The institution also provides short-term courses for the trainees belonging to SC and ST categories. All admission processes at ITI Attingal are based on the marks obtained on 10th examinations from any recognized boards. It is recognized as a first grade and highly ranked ITI institute in the Kerala District. The trainees get placed through the institution placements cell in the NCTV affiliated trades.

College_Summary: Sree Narayana Polytechnic College was founded in 1957. It is located in a 15-acre campus at Kottiyam near Kollam, Kerala in South India. The Admission criteria for SNPTC is that the student should have passed SSLC/THSLC or equivalent examination with eligibility for higher studies. The college is well known for its student festivals such as the arts festival, union inauguration. sports meet, women's day and poly day.

The College offers 3year diploma courses in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical & Electronics, Electronics, Textile Technology, and Computer Engineering. Many multinational companies and Indian companies including WIPRO, EVASOFT, HCL, Larson, MRF, QUEST GLOBAL, etc., have visited the College for recruiting the students.

Admissions to the LMIMS is done on the basis of CMAT/CAT/KMAT scores followed by group discussion and personal interview. In addition to this, the institute arranges vacation training and project work for students in industries. The cell arranges management skill development programs and personality development programs. It continuously organizes training programs to enhance the employability of the students. The college is affiliated to the National Council of Vocational Training (NCVT), while it is certified by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO). The candidates seeking admission must meet the minimum eligibility criteria and if they fulfil that, the candidates will have to either appear in written test or qualify merit-based screening after which the interview takes place for finalizing the admission.

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College, Adoor is one of the major Technical institutions in Pathanamthitta district situated at Manakkala in Adoor.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic College Pala - [GPTCP], Kottayam
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College Pala (GPTCP) at Kottayam was formed to impart technical education to students. The college offers 3-year duration diploma courses in four streams namely Computer, Electronics, Instrumentation and, Electrical and Electronics Engineering. Students often pursue B.Tech. or B.E. after completing a polytechnic course in order to pursue a career in Engineering. The college has an actively participating placements cell to invite various companies for the recruitment drive after completing diploma course.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic, Kasaragod
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic, Kasaragod, one among the premier institutes of excellence under the government of Kerala got established in 1988 and it is located at Periye. This institute offers various diploma programs. It has an affiliation with the State Board of Technical Education, Kerala. The admission process only accepts Kerala Polytechnic exam scores for both the 1st and 2nd year admissions.

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Thrissur, Kunnamkulam is an educational institution that offers technical education oriented diploma under the affiliation of Directorate of Technical Education, Kerala. The college was established in Thrissur district of Kerala and had obtained its approval from AICTE. The admission is completely merit-based (ranking based on qualifying exam marks) and the candidates must have passed THSLC/SSLC to qualify for admission. The Career guidance and Placement Cell of the College is a separate department that looks after every essential aspect required to forge a strong personality out of students.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic College Attingal, Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College Attingal located at Thiruvananthapuram is one of the best polytechnic institutes in the state of Kerala. The college was started in 1994 by the Government of Kerala under the department of Technical Education. The college believes in the system of quality education by implementing it with well-experienced faculty. The college offers Technical Education in the form of a diploma program in 4 engineering branches. The admission to this college is based on the ranking/ merit list released by the Kerala Technical Education board.

For taking admission, candidates have to apply through online mode after passing senior secondary Level examination from any recognised board. Finally, the students have to participate in state counselling of Kerala to get into the institution based on the ranking made out of the qualifying exams.
